message: Hi Bob, I'm selling this incredible product that I think you'd be very interested in. I'm starting at $18000, but I'm open to discussing a fair price. What do you think?
I'm interested in the product, but $18000 is a bit steep for me. I was thinking more along the lines of $14000. Can you meet me in the middle?
Bob, I appreciate your offer, but $14000 is still a bit too low for me.  I'm willing to come down a bit, but I'm thinking $16000 would be a good compromise.  Let me know what you think.
I'm still interested in the product, but $16000 is a bit too high for me. I'm willing to pay $13500. Can you meet me at this price?

Bob, I understand your position, but $13500 is still a bit too low for me. I'm willing to come down to $15000 as a final compromise. This is a fantastic product, and I'm confident it will be worth every penny for you.
I appreciate your willingness to compromise, but $15000 is still a bit high for me. I'm willing to pay $13000. Can you meet me at this price?

Bob, I appreciate you coming up a bit, but $13000 is still a bit too low for me. I'm willing to meet you halfway, at $14500. This is a fair price for both of us, and I'm confident you won't regret this purchase.
I'm still not convinced that $14500 is the right price for me. I'm willing to pay $13500. This is my final offer, and I'm hoping we can come to an agreement.
